Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Erythema/Erythema Multiforme/Stevens-Johnson Syndrome
Record.Description: A variant of bullous erythema multiforme. It ranges from mild skin and mucous membrane lesions to a severe, sometimes fatal systemic disorder. Ocular symptoms include ulcerative conjunctivitis, keratitis, iritis, uveitis, and sometimes blindness. The cause of the disease is unknown.
